results.title: Simvastatin in nephrotic syndrome. Simvastatin in Nephrotic Syndrome Study Group.
results.text_hl: Whether they may influence the progression of @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@glomerular disease@@@ is not clear. The @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ in @DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@Nephrotic Syndrome@@@ Study addressed the question of whether or not @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ lowering by the @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@HMG-CoA reductase@@@ inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was superior to placebo treatment in limiting the decline of GFR and reducing @DISEASE_Proteinuria @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ in @DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@nephrotic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with primary @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005921 @@@glomerulonephritis@@@.

results.title: Effect of simvastatin on proliferative nephritis and cell-cycle protein expression.
results.text_hl: METHODS: The effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on a @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005921 @@@mesangial proliferative glomerulonephritis@@@ induced by antithymocyte antibody (anti-Thy 1.1 GN) was studied.

results.title: Simvastatin suppresses glomerular cell proliferation and macrophage infiltration in rats with mesangial proliferative nephritis.
results.text_hl: The most pronounced feature of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-treated @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005921 @@@GN@@@ was the suppression of the early glomerular cell proliferation.

results.title: Statin monotherapy attenuates renal injury in a salt-sensitive hypertension model of renal disease.
results.text_hl: The mechanism involved @GENE_CCL2 @GENE_24770 @@@MCP-1@@@ downregulation. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIMV@@@ treatment was also associated with a @GENE_KRAS @GENE_24525 @@@p21@@@ downregulation in the kidney, which might be involved in the protection of @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005921 @@@renal scarring@@@.

citations.NLM: Vieira JM Jr, Rodrigues LT, Mantovani E, Dellê H, Mattar AL, Malheiros DM, Noronha IL, Fujihara CK, Zatz R. Statin monotherapy attenuates renal injury in a salt-sensitive hypertension model of renal disease. Nephron Physiol. 2005;101(4):p82-91. PMID: 16113589
